channel.title: Need help with my downloadable client
channel.description: so when people download the client all that happens is goes to the login page and they try to login and it just says "error connecting to server". i need someone to help me so they can download the client and play the client without having that error.

item.title: Need help with my downloadable client
item.dc:creator: @hunterw hunterw
item.description:
@hunterw wrote:

can you show me on team viewer

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with my downloadable client

item.title: Need help with my downloadable client
item.dc:creator: @x1_att_ftw_x x1 att ftw x
item.description:
@x1_att_ftw_x wrote:

okay this is the way to do it.

Get jar Maker (Google)

Then go into Client.Java Or GUI Or EGUI, and search “0.0.0.0” or “127.0.0.1” or “localhost”
If found then change the “0.0.0.0” or “127.0.0.1” or “localhost” to Your Current ip that you portforwarded on (if you dident portforward i strongly suggest that you do, if you dont u wont have a server, unless u do it with hamachi but hamachi is shit. so dont). then Save and Compile

Then just click jar maker and sign and jar ur client.


Watch this video and be amazed.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with my downloadable client
